title: 恭喜我六级了【5个锭】
author: oqingzhao
txt_content: 嘤嘤嘤，终于六级了。在论坛潜水了1年多。发波锭。共五个。

replies.author: LittleHei
replies.txt_content: 恭喜，继续努力，7级不远了！

replies.author: Twilight_Two
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Twilight_Two 于 2019-4-2 19:30 编辑 

六级。。。我好像一直都没有发过锭。。
论坛人真多，来晚了233

replies.author: roothu
replies.txt_content: 六级还行 恭喜了

replies.author: Ghoststome
replies.txt_content: 恭喜恭喜，我也快渡劫成功了
恭喜6级，再肝肝
我没有了 TAT

replies.author: yun1998
replies.txt_content: 恭喜恭喜 囍提6级  7级等你~

replies.txt_content: 那恭喜大佬啦，准备征战7级

replies.author: cixuefeimang
replies.txt_content: 恭喜六级，虽然我来晚了

replies.author: 寒冰之家
replies.txt_content: 恭喜恭喜！

replies.author: 颗颗
replies.txt_content:

祝我也早日6级

replies.author: xiaodudu114
replies.txt_content: 虽然来晚了，但是恭喜六级！

replies.txt_content:
恭喜啦


PS：再次错过金锭~

replies.author: fancymimis
replies.txt_content: 恭喜吖。（来自不会发锭还发，结果被吞锭的某人）

replies.txt_content: qwq恭喜大佬6级
